Module fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant
Package fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant.abuse

Class AbuseFacade

java.lang.Object
fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant.abuse.AbuseFacade
public class AbuseFacade extends Object
The AbuseFacade class provides a high-level interface for managing abuse-related operations. It serves as a bridge between the application logic and the data access layer for abuse-related functionality.
